thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good choice for a business trip.
thread.title_full: Good choice for a business trip. - Review of Hilton Garden Inn Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: greecube
title: Good choice for a business trip.
text:
It's a Hilton, which means good service and clean rooms, nice amenities, and I was not disappointed. The other reviews here are accurate.
Staff was friendly and eager to assist. Really good rate for the location, and it is a great location. About a block away from Times Square and less noisy, several subway stops within a block of the hotel, and close to the Westside Highway l. Perfect location for my business trip.
If you are planning to see Amelie or A Bronx Tale anytime soon, these are playing right around the corner.
